General.Name: Mao Bao Inc
General.Description: Mao Bao Inc. manufactures and sells household and personal care products in Taiwan. The company offers laundry cleaning products, such as detergent, delicates, softeners, stain removers, and bleach products, as well as washing machine cleaners; home care products, including floor cleaners, botanical floor cleaners, all-purpose cleaners, natural surface disinfecting cleaners, and glass cleaner sprays; and kitchen aid products comprising dishwashing liquids, fruit and vegetable wash liquids, water pot cleaners, kitchenware stain removers, kitchen cleaner sprays, and natural baking soda kitchen grease removers.It also provides air fresheners; bathroom cleaning products; and personal cleaning products, such as shampoo, conditioner, body wash and lotion, antibacterial hand wash and hand gel, hand cream, and natural mosquito repellent. Mao Bao Inc. was incorporated in 1978 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 97 Chongsin Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 24161
